version_description:
Introducing Rap Battles! With Rap Battles, you don’t have to rap alone any more. Challenge anyone in your phonebook to your own epic three-round, turn-by-turn rap off. AutoRap seamlessly weaves verses from you and your opponent into a single track. Depending on what beat you choose and how much you have to say, the final song can be 20 seconds or 2 minutes of rapperly rapport.

What are you waiting for? Show your friends what you got!

What's up AutoRappers! FYI, Since releasing the Rap Battles feature in our last update, users like you have started more than 20,000 Rap Battles! Here's what's new:

- UI improvements make it simpler than ever to challenge your friends to a Rap Battle!
- A new side navigation menu makes getting to your profile and pending battles easier!
- Finally, we squashed a few bugs so saving songs is faster.

There's lots more to come! Find out about the latest news, songs released, updates on http://www.facebook.com/Smule and send any questions and feedback to support@smule.com.

Autorap's dropping another update today - and this one's all about you and your rap battling posse.

We've made profiles public so you can check out your fellow rappers, and created a section for checking out open rap battles to quickly get into the action with your reply. We've also improved inviting friends to battles as well as replying to a challenge. And last (but not least) you can now search for rappers by username, because what's a rap battler without friends, foes, and fans?

Plus, let's not forget the massive facelift update we put out last week:
• Totally New Look: We’ve given AutoRap a major facelift! Give her a spin and tell us what you think.
• Challenge the World: Face off against rappers all around the world in our new Rap Battle feed.
• Record Scratch: Now you can scratch records like a real DJ to give your verses some extra style.
• Longer Raps: We've made the maximum recording time longer for more epic throwdowns!
• Create Your Crew: Smule friends with AutoRap are now automatically added to your invite list so you can rap with your crew anytime, anywhere.
• Improved Battle Invitations: Battle Invites are easier to use, so you get into your rap faster.
• Improved Top Rappers Screen: Now it's even easier to check out the best raps!

AutoRap's update is short and sweet this time around. We've got a lot of new content and features coming down the road (no peeking - we're not quite ready yet!) but today brings more Bug Fixin' and Improvements as well as a a more straightforward way to save your raps. You'll also be able to register earlier so you can get that out of the way and start dropping rhymes.

Why, hello again. AutoRap Update Notes Team reporting for duty. Let's get to it, shall we?

Have you ever recorded an amazing track and wanted to remix it to see how it sounded with another beat? Now you can! Remixing is available for all subscribers starting today.

We've also boosted our processing speed. That means you'll get to listen to your mastered track even faster.

And last but not least, you can now follow any AutoRapper and invite them to Rap Battle you!

Why, hello there, AutoRappers! Today we've got some quick-n-dirty updates for you.

You can now control whether your raps go to the public feed right from your performance review screen!

All performances are now saved as both solo raps AND rap battles. You no longer have to choose. YOU CAN HAVE IT ALL!

And now... back to your regularly scheduled rapping program.

Why, hello there, AutoRappers! Today we've got some quick-n-dirty updates for you.

You can now control whether your raps go to the public feed right from your performance review screen!

All performances are now saved as both solo raps AND rap battles. You no longer have to choose. YOU CAN HAVE IT ALL!

And now... back to your regularly scheduled rapping program.

Autorap updates incoming... now!

Today's all about making it easier for you to find, join, and enjoy raps.

First up: you can now join Rap Battles via the Songbook. Choose a beat that strikes your fancy, check out the open battles, and start rapping!

We've also added the option to Follow a rapper after you've battled them, making it easier to rematch them in the future.

And last but not least, we've improved Notifications: you will now be notified when someone loves your performance!

REDESIGNED FEED: We've completely rebuilt the feed from the ground up, making it smoother, faster, and smarter. The best content from the AutoRap community are just a tap away. Listen to dope rhymes and reply with your own verses.

iOS 8 FIXES: We’re up-to-date! (Say that three times fast - hopefully in a rap!)

What’s up, Autorappers? It’s time for another update!

NEW NAVIGATION: We've added a new menu at the bottom of your screen so you can access the feed, notifications, profile, and songbook faster than before.

UPDATED PROFILES: Your recordings are now automatically sorted into categories (i.e. Challenges, Solos, and Battles) so you can find them faster.

MORE FREE BEATS: Turkey Burgers is no longer the only 'FREE' beat. Check back every week to find new 'FREE' beats and boost the diversity of your recordings.

BUG FIXES: We fixed a handful of issues and improved the stability of the app. As always, please contact us at www.smule.com/support if you notice a bug. Give us as much information as you can about what you were doing when the bug appeared so we can track it down and fix it!

TOPICS: We've redesigned the What's Hot section so you can browse freestyle performances that talk about interesting community topics. To be featured in the What's Hot section, simply record a performance in 'Rap Mode' and choose a topic (or add a hashtag) such as #Struggle, #MyCity, #Style, etc. Rap about things you care about. Respond to other rappers' performances and continue the conversation.

REMIX: After recording a song, you can change the backing track. We'll magically adjust your voice to fit the new beat and make it sound as good as the old one. (Available for VIP Users.)

BETTER FEED: We've tweaked the feed so you will find better, more diverse performances.

UI & BUG FIXES: We've fixed a dozen or so bugs in the app involving profiles, song selection, and notifications, so everything should run smoother now.

iOS8 SUPPORT: Hoorah! AutoRap has been optimized for iOS 8.

BUG FIXES: We've cleared out a lot of old bugs. The app should be more stable than ever.

BACKEND TECH UPDATES: We've also made a number of significant updates in audio technology that will allow us to introduce some pretty cool new features in the near future.

PERFORMANCE SCROLL BAR: When listening to performances on the feed, you can now fast forward or rewind the track! You no longer have to sit through your own performance in order to listen to another rapper's response.

BETTER SHARING: When sharing your performances, you can add a personalized message. Also, your rap can be played in-line from within Facebook! In other words, your friends will be able to listen to your rap without ever leaving Facebook.

STABILITY IMPROVEMENTS: We fixed crashes to make the experience smoother!

We appreciate all of your support!
Some under-the-hood technical tweaks to make the app run smoother.
More bug fixes, crash fixes, and polish!

IOS9 SUPPORT
-- Awesome! AutoRap has been optimized for iOS 9

UI FIXES
-- Fixed the visualizer on iPhone 6S and 6S+ devices, which was not behaving properly in TALK mode.
-- Fixed a bug that prevented users from sharing their rap on Facebook.
-- Fixed a bug that prevented users from challenging another user
-- Fixed an issue that allowed you to follow yourself

STABILITY IMPROVEMENTS
-- Fixed several crash bugs to make the experience smoother

– We have updated Smule's privacy policy. Please review at http://www.smule.com/privacy
Lots of other under-the-hood improvements and bug fixes.

Major New Improvements to AutoRap!

You can now use your camera and create rap videos!
We've also redesigned the recording, customization and publish screens to improve your experience.
The feed has received a major overhaul as well, making it easier to browse through the latest raps and battles from your crew and followers.
There are also a number of additional other improvements and under the hood optimizations.
This is a great milestone for the app and we are very excited to hear what you think. Feel free to reach out at community@autorap.com

Maintenance and Bug Fixes
Some minor adjustments to improve the app

Native Video Sharing - your video recording is instantly ready for sharing.

Improved Top Rappers Algorithm - the ranking algorithm has been greatly improved to better showcase the top raps in the community

Other updates and improvements.

Bug Fixes & Performance Improvements

Community Beats Curation – you can now rate the overall quality of the community beats, as well as share any issues with a specific track.

Other updates and improvements.

Introducing video lenses – We’ve added a number of rap-inspired augmented reality video lenses to make your videos more entertaining, engaging and captivating. Choose from 9 uniquely different filters and try them out!

Now it's even faster to switch from talking to rapping in AutoRap. Just pick your beat and start recording. From there, you can choose to rap over the beat or talk and watch AutoRap's technology transform your speech into rap.
